title: Nepal: where the legends live
brief_description: Short documentary exploring the elements which draw travellers from all over the glove to Nepal, including culture, spiritual practices, and the natural beauty of the surrounding land. Narrated by Gunter Less.
description: Short documentary exploring the elements which draw travellers from all over the glove to Nepal, including culture, spiritual practices, and the natural beauty of the surrounding land. Narrated by Gunter Less.
